attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please save 33 signals regement as our regement is one of the best in the TA we have amazing people who work within the regement who over the past few years have made a real difference to the effectiveness of the regement , Signals is clearly a huge part of any operation and cutting 3 regements will have a huge effect on the way the army operates please re concider the desicion to close those regements.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save 33 signals regement."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20180


Prime Minister's Office
